thread.title: Keith Anderson
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Keith Anderson

author: Keith Anderson
title: Keith Anderson
text:
I have purchased a whole house salt free water softener and hot water filter from Pelican water systems. Both of my purchases I called and talked to a sales rep before I purchased each piece, hey was very helpful and knowledgeable about the products. I installed both units myself without any issues. After about 1 year of owning the hot water filter I had 1 issue with hot water filter, I called customer service and talked to and actual human that can speaker English. He sent out an replacement unit at no cost.
I would and have recommended Pelican to anybody that's interested in water system.
